mapper.select: select DISTINCT a.*, q.apv_auth_id, q.apv_auth_name, q.apv_time, q.apv_num, md.depart_code, m.member_stratdate, m.member_enddate, ap.pay_id, ap.pay_date, ap.pay_title, ap.pay_cash, md.depart_name as depart_name1, d1.depart_name as depart_name2, d2.depart_name as depart_name3, d3.depart_name as depart_name4 from approval a, approval_auth q, member m, department md, department d1, department d2, department d3, apv_payment ap where a.appro_id = #{appro_id} and q.member_id = (select m.member_id from approval a, member m where a.appro_id = #{appro_id} and a.appro_mem1 = m.member_name) and m.member_name = (select appro_member_id from approval where appro_id = 1) and md.depart_code = (select d.depart_code from approval a, member m, department d where a.appro_id = #{appro_id} and a.appro_member_id = m.member_name and m.depart_code = d.depart_code) and d1.depart_code = (select d.depart_code from approval a, member m, department d where a.appro_id = #{appro_id} and a.appro_mem1 = m.member_name and m.depart_code = d.depart_code) and d2.depart_code = (select d.depart_code from approval a, member m, department d where a.appro_id = #{appro_id} and a.appro_mem2 = m.member_name and m.depart_code = d.depart_code) and d3.depart_code = (select d.depart_code from approval a, member m, department d where a.appro_id = #{appro_id} and a.appro_mem3 = m.member_name and m.depart_code = d.depart_code) and ROWNUM = 1
mapper.update: update approval set appro_auth1=#{appro_auth1},appro_auth2=#{appro_auth2}, appro_auth3=#{appro_auth3}, appro_auth_date1 = sysdate, appro_auth_date2 = sysdate, appro_auth_date3 = sysdate, apro_status = apro_status+1 where appro_id = #{appro_id}
update approval_auth set apv_auth_name = #{apv_auth_name} where appro_id = #{appro_id}
mapper.select: select DISTINCT md.depart_name, m1.member_name as m1_member_name, r1.rank_name as rank_name_r1, m2.member_name as m2_member_name, r2.rank_name as rank_name_r2, m3.member_name as m3_member_name, r3.rank_name as rank_name_r3, my.member_id, appro_id, md.depart_code from member my, department md, member m1, member m2, member m3, rank r1, rank r2, rank r3, (select * from approval ORDER BY appro_id DESC) where my.member_name = #{member_name} and my.depart_code = md.depart_code and m1.rank_code = 1 and m2.rank_code = 2 and m3.depart_code = (select depart_code from member where member_name = #{member_name}) and m3.rank_code = (select rank_code from member where depart_code = (select depart_code from member where member_name = #{member_name}) and rank_code = 3) and r1.rank_code = 1 and r2.rank_code = 2 and r3.rank_code = (select rank_code from member where depart_code = (select depart_code from member where member_name = #{member_name}) and rank_code = 3) and ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: insert into approval (appro_id, appro_sort, appro_member_id, appro_mem1, appro_mem2, appro_mem3, appro_title, appro_content, appro_filename, appro_indate) values ((select NVL(MAX(appro_id),0)+1 from approval), #{appro_sort}, #{appro_member_id}, #{appro_mem1}, #{appro_mem2}, #{appro_mem3}, #{appro_title}, #{appro_content}, #{appro_filename}, sysdate)

insert into approval_auth (apv_num, appro_id, apv_auth_id, apv_time, member_id) values ((select NVL(MAX(apv_num), 0) + 1 from approval_auth), (select MAX(appro_id) from approval), 0, sysdate, (select member_id from member where member_name = #{appro_mem1}))

insert into apv_payment (pay_id, appro_id, pay_date, pay_title, pay_cash) values ((select NVL(MAX(pay_id), 0) + 1 from apv_payment), (select MAX(appro_id) from approval), #{pay_date}, #{appro_title}, #{pay_cash})
mapper.update: update member set member_vacation = 1, member_vacation_num = (select member_num-#{member_num} from member where member_id = #{member_id}), member_stratdate = #{member_stratdate}, member_enddate = #{member_enddate}, member_num = #{member_num} where member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.select: select count(apro_status) as apro_status0 from approval a where apro_status = 0
select count(apro_status) as apro_status1 from approval a where apro_status = 1 or apro_status = 2
select count(apro_status) as apro_status2 from approval a where apro_status = 3
select count(apro_status) as apro_statusmy from approval a where 3 > apro_status and appro_member_id = (select member_name from member where member_id = #{member_id})

select count(apro_status) as apro_statusm from approval a where apro_status > 3 and appro_mem1 = (select member_name from member where member_id = #{member_id}) or appro_mem2 = (select member_name from member where member_id = #{member_id}) or appro_mem3 = (select member_name from member where member_id = #{member_id})
select count(*) as myc_count from calendar where member_id = #{member_id} and sysdate between to_date(CALENDAR_START, 'YY-MM-DD') and to_date(CALENDAR_END, 'YY-MM-DD')
select count(*) as b_statusc from board where b_status = 1
